scenes.action_text: AD ASTRA Written by James Gray & Ethan Gross 8/11/16 SUPERIMPOSE THE LEGEND: ONE HUNDRED YEARS FROM NOW. BLACK. We TILT DOWN to REVEAL: THE EARTH, AS VIEWED FROM ABOVE. We HEAR MUSIC: a CHEERFUL PIECE, incongruous with the awesome image of our planet. CUT TO: A NEWS REPORT on PBS. The introductory music accompanies the logo fo
